data.eml:eml: A new species of Stenolemus Signoret (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Reduviidae: Emesinae) from India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mukherjee, Paramita, Ambrose, Dunston P., Hassan, M. E., Biswas, B. (2015): A new species of Stenolemus Signoret (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Reduviidae: Emesinae) from India. Zootaxa 3904 (1): 116-122, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3904.1.7
